ComicInfo.Title: Cracked's Energy Saving Guide; Landscape Painting; High Plains Shifter; The Cracked History of Art; Cracked Interviews the Advertising King; Cracked's Sure-Fire Guide to Weight Control; The Seers Rubbish Catalog of Useless Items for 1974; The Big City versus the Small Town; Cracked's Solution for Solving the Energy Crisis; Canyon
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.The dungeon keeper offers a prisoner a new job feeding birds - vultures, that is.
Sagebrush paints the landscape despite there being nothing to see.
At first Stanley admires ants but comes to see them as communist agitators.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:36:44. [Issue ID 250478]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Murray Ball,John Langton,Bill Ward,Don Orehek,Bernard Baily
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,Murray Ball,John Langton,Bill Ward,Don Orehek,Bernard Baily
